messages.content: I cannot connect to my cluster c-123 in us-east-1.
Hello! I see that c-123 is currently in 'maintenance' mode. It should be back in 10 minutes.
Oh, I missed the notification. Thanks.
Why was I charged $500 this month?
You exceeded the 100 req/sec rate limit multiple times, triggering the overage tier.
I see. Can I upgrade to Enterprise?
Yes, I can forward you to sales.
